nodes.text: The Insanity Claws was a Z-95 Headhunter, that was owned by the Zabrak slaver Haast Aath.

During the time of the Clone Wars, Aath flew to the Cularin system in the Insanity Claws, in command of a number of droid-controlled starships. He then captured a number of Tarasin to force into slavery and put them aboard the droid-controlled ships, then left the system with the Claws and the slaves. He then flew to the planet Tharados, where he had a slave compound.
